name: Rad Racing
description:
Rad Racing

A rad racing game

Bored on a Sunday afternoon, Nothing but to do but browse what new games are flooding the indie scene. But you are looking for something special, something unique, something RAD.
That's when you found it: A Rad Racing Game!

One track, one car, one gamemode.

Controls

Arrow Keys / WASD for acceleration and steering.

Space to brake.

R / enter to re spawn.

esc to pause / exit.
